clanLogo.recommendedSize: We recommend an image of at least 512x512 for the clan.

clanBanner.title: Clan Banner Background
clanBanner.description: This image will display at the top of your channels list.
clanBanner.recommendedSize: The recommended minimum size is 960x540 and recommended aspect ratio is 16:9.

systemMessages.title: System Messages Channel
systemMessages.description: This is the channel we send system event messages to. These can be turned off at any time
systemMessages.welcomeRandom: Send a random welcome message when someone joins this clan.
systemMessages.welcomeSticker: Prompt members to reply to welcome messages with a sticker.
systemMessages.boostMessage: Send a message when someone Boosts this server.
systemMessages.setupTips: Send helpful tips for clan setup.
systemMessages.auditLog: Send a log when an action is applied to the clan

emoji.title: Emoji
emoji.description: Add up to 250 custom emoji that anyone can use in this server. Animated GIF emoji may be used by members with Mezon Nitro

requirements.fileSize: Recommended file size: 256 KB (We'll compress for you)
requirements.naming: Naming: Emoji names must be at least 2 characters long and can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores

stickers.description: Stickers can be static (PNG) or animated (APNG, GIF). Stickers must be exactly 320 x 320 pixels and no larger than 512KB. We will automatically resize static PNG and animated GIF stickers for you.
stickers.customizeMessage: Let's customize the amazing stickers with your interest
